ref: 4706 *carmavatī ʻ a partic. tree ʼ. [Cf. carmavant -- ʻ covered with hide ʼ Pāṇ. Kāś., cármaṇvant -- ʻ furnished with skin ʼ TS., carmaṇvatī -- f. ʻ the banana plant ʼ, carmadruma -- m. ʻ the parchment tree ʼ lex. -- cárman -- ]
H. camoī f. ʻ a Nepalese tree from the bark of which paper is made ʼ.
